p: Territory of Washington, County of Spokane}ss Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs. Ray Raymond Defendant} In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, in and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory. TO THE SHERIFF OF Spokane COUNTY, GREETING: IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon C.L. Swait to be and appear before the District Court, at the Court House, in Spokane Falls, in said County, on the forthwith day of May A.D. 1887 at o'clock M. to here give evidence in the above entitled cause on part of said Defendant there to remain until discharged. WITNESS the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of this 31st day of May A.D. 1887 D.A. Clement Clerk By Deputy
